lead_paragraph: When the Patriots lost to the Colts in the American Football Conference championship game last season, their top three wide receivers were Reche Caldwell, Jabar Gaffney and Troy Brown. When this season began, all three had been replaced — with Randy Moss, Wes Welker and Donte’ Stallworth — in what may turn out to be the biggest bargain in league history.
